name: Churchill (Cigar Hut)
additionalNotes: Bulldog Cigars are banded with the United States Marine Corp logo. Long filler Dominican tobaccos combined with a Ecuadorian/Connecticut wrapper make Bulldogs not only a great conversation piece, but one heck of a great cigar. The Cigar Hut has just obtained the exclusive rights to sell them online and we are proud to offer them to our service members at home or overseas as well as any fan of the US Marines.
